name: flights_bulk_search
description: Search multiple flight routes on Google Flights in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling flights_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass routes as comma-separated 'from-to' pairs. Example: 'NYC to London,NYC to Paris,NYC to Tokyo'.

parameters.name: routes
parameters.description: Comma-separated flight routes as 'from to destination' pairs (e.g. 'NYC to London,LA to Tokyo,Chicago to Miami')

steps.code: return `{{routes}}`.split(',').map(r => { const route = r.trim(); return { url: 'https://www.google.com/travel/flights?q=' + encodeURIComponent(route), route: route }; })
steps.name: items
steps.label: Build flight search URL list

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const flightCards = document.querySelectorAll('li.pIav2d'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(flightCards.length, 5); i++) { const card = flightCards[i]; const priceEl = card.querySelector('div.FpEdX span, div.YMlIz span, span[data-gs]'); const airlineEl = card.querySelector('div.sSHqwe.tPgKwe.ogfYpf, div.sSHqwe span'); const depTimeEl = card.querySelector('span[aria-label^="Departure time"], div.zxVSec span.eoY5cb'); const arrTimeEl = card.querySelector('span[aria-label^="Arrival time"]'); const durationEl = card.querySelector('div[aria-label^="Total duration"], div.gvkrdb'); const stopsEl = card.querySelector('div.hF6lYb span.rGRiKd, div.EfT7Ae span, span[aria-label*="stop"]'); results.push({ airline: airlineEl ? airlineEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', departure_time: depTimeEl ? depTimeEl.textContent.trim() : '', arrival_time: arrTimeEl ? arrTimeEl.textContent.trim() : '', duration: durationEl ? durationEl.textContent.trim() : '', stops: stopsEl ? stopsEl.textContent.trim() : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { route: params.get('q') || decodeURIComponent(window.location.href.split('q=')[1] || '').split('&')[0], result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: flight_results
detailSteps.label: Extract flight results
